//: None of these monsters are actually animals but all have the ANIMAL flag, because those closer to the natural world are less antagonistic to the Green
description: A thick mass of animated vine, lashing back and forth at anything that comes within reach.  Long thorns grow from its sides.

special_attacks.hit_dmg_u: %1$s lashes out and curls around your %2$s!
special_attacks.miss_msg_u: %s lashes out at you, but you dodge!
special_attacks.miss_msg_npc: %s lashes out at <npcname>, but they dodge!

special_attacks.//: armor penetration here represents that you'll literally surrounded by thorns
special_attacks.hit_dmg_u: %1$s squeezes and its thorns dig into your %2$s!
special_attacks.miss_msg_u: %1$s tries to squeeze you, but you fight back!
special_attacks.miss_msg_npc: %1$s tries to squeeze <npcname>, but they fight back!
special_attacks.no_dmg_msg_u: %1$s squeezes your %2$s, but fails to penetrate your armor.
special_attacks.no_dmg_msg_npc: %1$s squeezes <npcname>, but fails to penetrate their armor.

death_function.message: The %s rots into nothingness in moments.

name: thornwight
description: A creature of moss and brambles in the shape of a man.  Despite being made of wood, it moves with a fluid grace.  It clutches a spear seemingly made of a single thorn-covered branch in one hand, the thorns gleaming slightly with sticky sap.

death_function.message: The %s collapses into a massive pile of brambles and moss.

name: thorn-bear
description: A creature of moss and thorns in the shape of a bear.  Its eyes are a faintly-glowing brilliant green.

special_attacks.hit_dmg_u: The thorns on %1$s suddenly grow into spears, impaling your %2$s!
special_attacks.hit_dmg_npc: The thorns on %1$s suddenly grow into spears, impaling <npcname>!
special_attacks.miss_msg_u: The thorns on %1$s suddenly grow into spears, but you dodge!
special_attacks.miss_msg_npc: The thorns on %1$s suddenly grow into spears, but <npcname> dodges!
special_attacks.no_dmg_msg_u: The thorns on %1$s suddenly grow into spears, but fail to penetrate your armor.
special_attacks.no_dmg_msg_npc: The thorns on %1$s suddenly grow into spears, but fails to penetrate <npcname>'s armor.

death_function.message: The %s collapses into a massive pile of brambles and moss.
